title: Was ‘Gone With the Wind’ Actress Hattie McDaniel Forced to Sit in the Back at the Oscars?
subtitle: She was the first Black woman to win an Academy Award for her portrayal of "Mammy" in the movie.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Black actress Hattie McDaniel was not allowed to sit with her white co-stars during the Academy Awards ceremony in 1940.
